songs.title: Intro
songs.lyrics:
[School bell rings]

[Teacher: Ras Baraka]
Please respond when I call your name...
Alright, Kevin Charles... (here)
Jaris Boykins... (here)
Alicia Simmons... (here)
Phillip Valdez... (here)
Gabrielle Salado... (here)
Latoya Bradberry... (right here)
Antawn Mitchell... (here)
Shaquan Sutton... (here)
Cory Thomas... (here)
Tyron Lucas... (here)
Kennia Codwell...(here)
Tanika Marshall... (here)
Lauryn Hill...
Lauryn Hill...
Lauryn Hill...
Walton Spates... (here)

(music fades)
